segments.text: My name is Liu Wei . I have booked a ticket to Boston three days before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right and your flight number is CA621 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But now I want to make a change . Please cancel this flight and transfer me to flight GB105 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excuse me , sir . Flight GB105 is one to Milan , are you sure of your change ?
segments.speaker: S1
